channel.title: Login and Disconnect/Reconnect
channel.description:
Hi Mopar
So I've downloaded the Rune-Sanctum base and have it up and running, and I have no problems logging in, however, after logging in I cannot move and then after a few seconds simply disconnect.
And it's not a full disconnect either it just keeps disconnecting and reconnecting.
Any ideas?
EDIT:
I also noticed the memory is climbing drastically.
[url=http://gyazo.com/afba186c6705f857310c3aafaa1714b7]http://gyazo.com/afba186c6705f857310c3aafaa1714b7[/url]
